Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
06.08.2014 SH SCR19055 Split column 33 (Reserve 20) into 4 columns (MarkCode(3), Discount1Amount(8),Discount2Amount(8) and
Reserve(1) and added update of NFIN_DISCOUNT1AMOUNT, NFIN_DISCOUNT2AMOUNT, NFIN_DISCOUNT3AMOUNT
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
17.01.2011 SH SCR16142 Added update NFIN_MARKCODE/NFIN_MARKCODETEXT, incl.
test on input fields 32 (code divers)/33(reserve)
22.11.2010 SH SCR15901 Replaced asterix (*) with 'A' in invoice number
19.10.2010 SH SCR15370 Removed test on amount fields (0-9 tests) and added test
to store NFIN rows on if the invoice amount <> 0
04.10.2010 SH SCR15370 Fixed problem with 'blank' lines in files (also Hex 00)
and added UFB544 to reformat debtor client number
08.09.2010 SH SCR15370 Fixed problem regarding extraction of invoice number
29.07.2010 SH SCR15201 Added GB007.PI.LANGUAGE = CLNT201_LANGUAGE
18.01.2010 SH SCR15255 Changed BSP202_20.PI.RECORDFLAG = blank in
v.Field1 (RecordFlag)
30.09.2008 SH SCR14011 Added UFB544.PI.RemoveLeadingZeros=TRUE
13.05.2008 SH SCR13604 Added PO.REALDEBTORFILE
22.02.2008 SH SCR13420 Moved BSP202-10 from part "stored after first NFIN"
to the end of program after calilng BSP202-20
06.02.2008 SH SCR13362 Convert Debtor number client, invoice number to upper
30.01.2008 SH SCR13340 Added UFB544 to remove leading zeros from invoice number
if CLNT307_CLNTINVNO_NUMERIC= Y
08.01.2007 SH SCR13260 Store one extra NFER row in case of >= 10 errors
21.12.2007 SH SCR13235 Extended test on debtor number ('0000000000')
17.12.2007 SH SCR13224 Diff. changes see, SCR for details
-- Program is finished if all lines are read from inputfile or if
10 errors are detected
-- fields 14 -17 are not used
-- Input variables with proper FL pictures
-- Previous values of input variables, have to be tested only in case of changes
-- Database fields uses to store NFIN, fetched already during validations
-- Validation and error handling
-- uses for storing to new invoice row
-- Set variables
... unique for FF rows, will be increased with +1
-- Init following check variables to test if there is a change with values which
never exists
(if using default values then the program never detects empty / 0 fields)
-- Perform the following step only if there's no reason to reject the file, see
call of BSP202_10 in R.S.
... if at least one NFER (error) row is stored set PO.ERROR = TRUE
-- Define the handling type if at least one NFIN row is stored and no
errors are detected (not if uploaded via website --> PI.NFIR_IFIL_ID = 0)
-- Check if file has to be rejected after the last NFIN row is stored and no
errors are detected (not if uploaded via website --> PI.NFIR_IFIL_ID = 0)
-- Reset variables
-- It's possible that new invoice files for NL are a mix of FF (invoice) and
DD (debtor) rows. The DD rows have to be skipped, so no validation or
storing to database.
-- First line should contain a header row, in this case ignore this line and
blank lines have to be ignored (also lines with Hex 00)
-- Handle detail records (FF)
... set record flag for BSP202-20, uses to set the runtype
... always update NFIR_ADMNO / NFIR_CLNTNO for first row where client exist
...in case of no errors are detected store row in NFIN (skip storing NFIN rows
if invoice amount = 0)
-- Program is finished if all lines are read from inputfile or if
10 errors are detected
-- Inform users that testing is stopped because of >= 10 errors
-- fields 14 -17 are not used
... fetch error text
-- Format input fields to their proper FL pictures
... replace asterix (*) by 'A' in invoice number
... optional field
... optional field
... if number of decimals > 0 use this value to build the amount, else in case
of currency = JPY no decimals, for all other currencies 2 decimals
-- Check for existing client (only once or in case of changes)
-- Error --> Client does not exisrts
-- Schedule number mandatory
-- Check debtor number
... error --> debtor number = blank or only contains '0' characters
-- Reformat debtor number
... always if GSET_QUANTITY(38) >1 and <9,
else leading zeroes have to be removed if GSET_QUANTITY = 0 and
CLNT306_CLNTDEBTNO_NUMERIC =Y
-- Invoice number contains quotes --> Error
-- Invoice number has to be reformatted (no leading zeros/blanks)
-- Check invoice date
... must have value and must be a valid date
... must be between date from and date until
-- Check value date
... optional but must be a valid date if <> blank / 000000
... must be between date from and date until
-- Check due days, optional field (must be < 999)
-- Check due date
... optional but must be a valid date if <> blank / 000000
... must be between date from and date until
-- Check Debit/Credit flag --> error if not (-, +, space)
-- Check number of decimals behind comma (0 and 2 allowed)
-- Check currency code (only in case of changes)
.. in case of numeric currency it's a heller currency, else an ISO currency
... error --> Currency code = blank or does not exisrts
-- Check G-amount (WKA) variables
... check Debit/Credit flag --> error if not (-, +, space)
... check number of decimals behind comma (0 and 2 allowed)
... check currency code (optinal, only in case of changes)
.. in case of numeric currency it's a heller currency, else an ISO currency
... error --> Currency code = does not exist
-- Check discount 1 days, optional field (must be < 999)
-- Check discount 2 days, optional field (must be < 999)
-- Check discount 3 days, optional field (must be < 999)
-- Check VAT amount variables
... check Debit/Credit flag --> error if not (-, +, space)
... check number of decimals behind comma (0 and 2 allowed)
... check currency code (optinal, only in case of changes)
.. in case of numeric currency it's a heller currency, else an ISO currency
... error --> Currency code = does not exist
-- Check field 'Code divers' (optional field)
... error --> only values A,B,C and 0-9 are allowed
-- Check field 'Markcode' (optional field)
... error --> mark code wrong
... fetch error text
-- Increase v.NFIN_LINENO with +1 for the next detail rows
... replace quote (') by space
-- Update some NFIR fields for first stored NFIN row
-- Tro to update NFIN_MARKCODE (type = 3)/ NFIN_MARKCODETEXT (type = 2)
